scripts.frontend: cd frontend && bun run start && cd ..
scripts.frontend:dev: cd frontend && bun run start:dev && cd ..
scripts.frontend:dev:network: cd frontend && bun run start:dev:network && cd ..
scripts.backend: cd backend/gameServer && bun run start && cd ../..
scripts.backend:test: cd backend/gameServer && bun run test && cd ../..
scripts.setup: cd frontend && bun install && cd ../backend/gameServer && bun install && cd ../..
